channel.title: Debugging on MeVisLab Examples
channel.description: Recent content in Debugging on MeVisLab Examples

item.title: Chapter VI: Testing
item.description: MeVisLab Tutorial Chapter VI Testing, Profiling and Debugging in MeVisLab The MeVisLab Integrated Development Environment (IDE) provides tools to write automated tests in Python, profile your network performance and to debug your Python code. All of these funtionalities will be addressed in this chapter. Testing The MeVisLab TestCenter is the starting point of your tests. Select [ File → Run TestCaseManager ] to open the user interface of the TestCaseManager.
